summary: Control Center page, route, and TopNav entry were added along with an admin guard and an App Configuration section. Admin operations appear consolidated into a new tabbed component. However, at least two acceptance criteria are not met based on the diff: transporter unassignment from the assignment workflow is explicitly unsupported, and bottom-ad settings are still localStorage-based rather than a single persisted source of truth.

missing_requirements.requirement: From the Control Center, an admin can assign/unassign transporters to loads using the existing assign transporter workflow UI.
missing_requirements.reason: The implemented assignment control explicitly states that unassignment is not supported and disables the "Unassigned" option, which conflicts with the unassign requirement.

missing_requirements.requirement: Bottom ad settings can be controlled from the Control Center via a single source of truth (persisted and reloadable), rather than being device-only localStorage.
missing_requirements.reason: The Control Center App Configuration section reads/saves bottom ad settings via getAdSettings/saveAdSettings from a local config module, and even dispatches a client-side window event, indicating it remains local/browser storage rather than a centralized persisted source of truth.

hallucinated_features.description: Location evidence viewer for transporters (new UI + query calling actor.getLocationEvidence).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not mentioned in the BuildRequest requirements for the Control Center or app configuration.

hallucinated_features.description: Transporter operational status card UI and related query/mutation usage.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested as part of adding a Control Center or app configuration; appears as additional feature work.

hallucinated_features.description: Load Board access restriction changes (e.g., browse loads restricted to verified transporters) and related UX updates.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested in the Control Center/admin consolidation scope.

hallucinated_features.description: Content edits to About/Services regional coverage list (adding Democratic Republic of Congo) and Contact page contact details updates.
hallucinated_features.reason: Content/marketing updates are unrelated to the Control Center/admin consolidation requirements.
